explains: v. 洗澡，给（某人）洗澡；游泳，嬉水；用水清洗（尤指身体部位）；（光线）洒满，覆盖
wordGroup: go for a bathe [主英国英语] 去洗一次海(或河、湖)水浴；去游泳

sentences.en: For super-soft skin, lather on a light body lotion before you bathe.
sentences.cn: 若皮肤极为柔嫩，可在沐浴前涂上温和的护肤乳液。

sentences.en: The police have warned the city's inhabitants not to bathe in the polluted river.
sentences.cn: 警方已经警告本市居民不要在那条被污染的河里游泳。

sentences.en: Slowly, people began to bathe more frequently.
sentences.cn: 慢慢地，人们开始更频繁地洗澡。
